com.tyrlib2.graphics.particles

Class Affector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.graphics.scene.SceneObject
      • com.tyrlib2.graphics.particles.Affector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColorChanger, ForceAffector

    public abstract class Affector
extends SceneObject
    This class takes care of affecting a particle ie changing color, speed, etc
    Author:
    Sascha
